taxonomicnotes: This species was described from Lake Indawgyi (in the Irrawaddy River drainage) as A. variegatus variegatus by Prashad & Mukerji (1929). However, this name is subjectively invalid and preoccupied in Akysis by Pimelodus variegatus Bleeker, 1846.  Hora (1936) subsequently renamed this species A. prashadi.
rationale: Although Akysis prashadi does not seem to have a wide geographic distribution, there are no known threats and occasional collection for the ornamental fish trade is not projected to adversely affect population, and it is assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Pal, M., Vishwanath, W. & Molur, S.
